main event: A woman observed unusual lights and sounds of a UFO in Chester, Pennsylvania for about 13 minutes before it left the area.
interesting points: The object was described as being silent and ascending straight up,The sighting began in the northwestern sky and moved to the northeastern sky,The object was confirmed not to be an airplane or meteorite by the witness,Another observation was reported by Mr. Joseph Greer who noted a bright disc-shaped object hovering nearby,Mr. Greer used binoculars and a telescope to confirm the sighting, and the object moved back and forth before disappearing at a high speed.
witness description: A woman, wife of a U.F.O. spotter; also Mr. Joseph Greer who reported a sighting from his home.
